text: Kyriakos Mitsotakis (; born 4 March 1968) is a Greek politician. He became Prime Minister of Greece on 8 July 2019. Mitsotakis is the President of the New Democracy party. He briefly left office in May 2023. He returned to office on 26 June 2023, after winning the general election. He is the son of former Prime Minister Konstantinos Mitsotakis. Mitsotakis has been a member of the Hellenic Parliament since 2004. He served as Minister of Administrative Reform from 2013 to 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Athens Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Stanford University alumni Category:Bankers Category:Government ministers of Greece Category:Prime ministers of Greece Category:Leaders of political parties Category:Current national leaders
title: Kyriakos Mitsotakis
